name: Easter Shabobble
description:
Easter Shabobble is a game where you collect easter eggs. There are four puzzle eggs hidden in each level. Can you find them all? Download the desktop version for better graphics and overall better performance.

Use WASD to move, 'e' to pick up items, 'q' to drop items, and press the spacebar to jump.

Easter Shabobble was created by King Kujito for Ludum Dare 42.
